headline: A Recount Or an Audit? Confusion In Georgia
text: Georgia’s 159 counties were poised on Thursday to begin recounting nearly five million ballots in the presidential election, but confusion surrounded the proceedings even as county officials raced to get ready.
snippet: While the review of ballots in Georgia is technically an audit, not a recount, elections officials said it was unlikely to change the outcome in the state, where Joe Biden leads by over 14,000 votes.
